title: [Cappyn's Weaponry]
[Cappyn's General Store]
[Cappyn's Outfitting]
description: Beneath a sturdy oak beam ceiling, an old elven war banner hangs on one of the textured black silk walls.  A iron-bound ebonwood chest and a twisted dark metal rack sit in opposite corners while a suit of golden armor rests on a glossy black ebonwood floor.
